title: DigitalMonk
author: DigitalMonk
content: Hello Developers, I am Monk, Digital Monk. I have planed to create "Bitcoin Charitable Trust" I need help from the Bitcoin developers team to do some coding and Web designing. Is there any one who can help me for some development work ? If you can and would like to help me out in my Bitcoin Charitable Trust then please let me know. I am supporting to teach English to unfortunate children in Orphans Care International by providing English teachers for 3 to 6 months. I recruits teachers from English speaking country and organise Charity Holiday for at list three months and provide free accommodation and food for their stay. The project need to upgrade to digital standard. So I need few developers to help out building a "Bitcoin Charitable Trust" platform. Please contact me for full information. Thank you for your interest in Charitable project work.

comments.author: fazal-akuma
comments.body: Dear Digital Monk, I am full stack Blockchain developer.My whatsapp#+447944621899. Best Regards,

comments.author: cgraphy.linux
comments.body: can i join that team, as a beginner in blockchain programming?

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: Aren't you the guy who claims he can singlehandedly influence Bitcoin's price or am I thinking of some other maniac? If it's a different person, I am pretty sure you have made some other ridiculous claims here like being an official Bitcoin ambassador (of a decentralized project), owning an offshore investment/trading platform, offering hundreds of thousands of dollars in your fake ambassador program... But at the same time asking what bitcoin is, what a blockchain is, if bitcoin exists in the blockchain or in wallets, etc.Whoever thinks about working with this person should check out the amount of ridiculousness that comes out of their mouth.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: MSDbitco on September 10, 2022, 08:51:27 PMits a great job brother, you can do it . if you need any help from me i can help you . i am not a bitcoiner but iam a web developer. If you want contact me through my twitter ,,,Before you offer your service to this guy do check his trust rating https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;u=3497607, it's not good he claims to be a Bitcoin ambassador and recruiting people to become Bitcoin ambassadors for $160k  A Job for Life: Bitcoin Ambassador - Salary: US $160,000I wonder why this guy keeps creating thread like this when the community do not trust him.
